GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
drm/radeon: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit b4b30f56ec512e2c35fc0761bc90b0e519d8fa6e, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit 268ba0a99f89a84dc5eb312470896113d0709c74. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/radeon: Add the missed acpi_put_table() to fix memory leak
